content: Katie Hafner and John Markoff’s “CYBERPUNK Outlaws and Hackers on the Computer Frontier.” wonderful to understand this time and mentality. 1991 NYTimes review of CyberPunk Discovered while rummaging through used-books market in Hyderabad, India — 1998. That, unlocking cheats to crack demo-versions of computer games, and guessing “forgot password” answers were amongst defined my digital adolescence.
